name: Mumbai
description: A fictional representation of the city in 'Tenet', featuring notable action scenes.

content.title: History
content.body: In the universe of *Tenet*, Mumbai is depicted as a bustling metropolis where significant parts of the plot unfold. The city is portrayed primarily for its architectural and urban landscape, which hosts crucial events linked to characters navigating complex time-inversion situations.

content.title: Geography
content.body: Located in India, Mumbai in *Tenet* combines elements of the real world with fictional enhancements to heighten the narrative's tension and urgency. The city is characterized by its high-rise buildings and busy streets which provide the backdrop for intense action sequences.

content.title: Notable Features
content.body: Mumbai features several important fictional locations, including the high-rise buildings where key espionage activities occur. The cityscape contributes to the tension and scale of the action sequences.

content.title: Story Significance
content.body: Mumbai serves as a critical location in *Tenet*, where the Protagonist and Neil execute a daring plan to capture Priya, who is integral to unraveling the antagonistic plot. The sequences in Mumbai emphasize the film's themes of time manipulation and reflect its intricate storyline.
